hint.text:
Observe that the graph is a straight line which rises proportionally.
Speed=\(\frac{Distance}{Time}\)

solution.text:
After _{j}_ hrs, the time is _{{j+7}}_ am.
Draw a vertical line from _{{j+7}}_ am on the x-axis upwards until it intersects the graph.
From this point draw a horizontal line towards the left until it intersects the y-axis.
This value gives the distance ran by Bolt in _{j}_ hrs.
For example : Look at the graph shown below.
In half an hour, Bolt runs 30kms

content.text: How many kms has Bolt ran after _{j}_ hrs?
